snippet: People were killed and 21 were wounded on Sunday when explosives attached to two young women, one of them about 15 years old, were detonated in a crowded market.
abstract: Two young women detonate bombs in crowded market in Potiskum, Nigeria, killing four people and wounding 21.
lead_paragraph: People were killed and 21 were wounded on Sunday when explosives attached to two young women, one of them about 15 years old, were detonated in a crowded market.

headline.main: Nigeria: Market Hit by Bombs Strapped to 2 Women
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Market Hit by Bombs Strapped to 2 Women
